revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in [[Johto]] for 5,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of [[Berry|berry]] mutations }}
La '''regadera''' es un [[Oak Items|Objeto de Oak]]. Al equiparla aumenta la probabilidad de [[Berry|mutaciones]] ocurridas en la [[Farm|granja]]. A diferencia de la mayoría de objetos de Oak no se desbloquea capturando Pokémons, en su lugar se puede comprar al Maestro de bayas de [[Johto]] en ciudad trigal. Además en lugar de Pokédolares necesita [[Farming Points|puntos de granja]]. ==Detalles==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +25% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 2,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |1 || +50% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 5,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |2 || +75% to mutation rate || 150 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 10,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |3 || +100% to mutation rate || 250 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 20,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |4 || +125% to mutation rate || 500 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |5/Max || +150% to mutation rate || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
== Estrategia para subir de nivel== Hay distintas estrategias eficaces para subir de nivel la regadera en función de que bayas hayas desbloqueado. Para ver las estrategias para subir de nivel ve a la [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|página de formaciones de la granja]]
{{Objetos de Oak}}
[[Category:Oak Items|Categoría:Objetos de Oak]] [[Category:Items|Categoría:Objetos]] [[Category:Farm|Categoría:granja]]

revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in [[Johto]] for 5,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of [[Berry|berry]] mutations }}
The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Johto]] Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars.
==Detalles==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +25% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 2,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |1 || +50% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 5,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |2 || +75% to mutation rate || 150 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 10,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |3 || +100% to mutation rate || 250 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 20,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |4 || +125% to mutation rate || 500 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |5/Max || +150% to mutation rate || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
== Estrategia para subir de nivel== Hay distintas estrategias eficaces para subir de nivel la regadera en función de que bayas hayas desbloqueado. Para ver las estrategias para subir de nivel ve a la [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|página de formaciones de la granja]]
{{Objetos de Oak}}

The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Johto]] Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars.
==Details==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +25% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 2,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |1 || +50% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 5,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |2 || +75% to mutation rate || 150 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 10,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |3 || +100% to mutation rate || 250 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 20,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |4 || +125% to mutation rate || 500 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |5/Max || +150% to mutation rate || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
== Leveling Strategies == There are a few highly efficient strategies on how to level up the Squirtbottle based on which berries you have unlocked. To see the leveling Strategies, see the [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|Farming Setups page]]
